metadata.title: CVE-2022-1016 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel innet/netfilter/nf_tables_core.c:nft_do_chain, which can cause ause-after-free. This issue needs to handle 'return' with properpreconditions, as it can lead to a kernel information leak problem causedby a local, unprivileged attacker.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-kvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1088.95').
linux-gcp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
